body: Kinda deep ending. And this guy draws the girls so cute and sexy!

I usually avoid skin-knife stories like the plague - it is the stupidest mind control or body swap mechanic possible, I have no clue what retard came up with it originally and why it caught on and is actually still a thing. But this is probably the only skin-knife with a restore function I've ever seen in hentai, so it caught my attention. That makes it quite unique from the usual sociopathic stories with one. Unfortunately, while it avoids the usual drawbacks of the theme, this ends up bad in some other ways. The story is terrible, it's just a string of random chances, though at least it doesn't go down the typical routes and has some kind of divine retribution at the end. The characters are terrible, no one takes even one rational decision throughout the whole thing. The porn is terrible too, the scenes are too few and most are too short and without details, and it just skimmed over some very interesting situations with so much potential.
Sad ending,but still it was a good   manga.
